name: php-sip2
tagline: PHP class library to facilitate communication with ILS servers via 3M's SIP2.
body:
### General Description
Using this class a programmer will be able to communicate with a library's integrated library system (ILS) via 3M's SIP2 (Standard Interchange Protocol).

This project is a work in progress, and as such there may be certain features that do not work correctly. You can find the current stable version under the source tab, or download the current stable code here.

### Protocol Information
You may find it helpful to view the 3M SIP2 protocol documentation.  As 3M has sold all of their library solutions to a new vendor, this documentation may be harder to locate than normal.  Try searching google for:  "SIP2 Protocol Definition".

### Donations
Find this project useful? Donate via PayPal
